00078 struct EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL EnvelopeAux {
00079     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00080     int              nreg;
00081     int              *regs;
00082     EnvelopeAux() : nreg(0) {};
00083     ~EnvelopeAux() { if(nreg>0) delete [] regs; };
00084 };
00085 
00086 EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00087         const vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> &geoms, const string &Name,
00088         bool newindexing) :
00089         EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), reg_to_inscr(0), local_start(0) {
00090     if( !G ) egsFatal("EGS_EnvelopeGeometry: base geometry must not be null\n");
00091     g = G; g->ref(); new_indexing = false;
00092     nbase = g->regions();
00093     n_in = geoms.size(); nmax = 1;
00094     int nreg_inscribed = 0;
00095     if( n_in > 0 ) {
00096         geometries = new EGS_BaseGeometry * [n_in];
00097         for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00098             geometries[j] = geoms[j]; geometries[j]->ref();
00099             int nj = geometries[j]->regions();
00100             if( nj > nmax ) nmax = nj;
00101             nreg_inscribed += nj;
00102         }
00103     }
00104     nreg = nbase + n_in*nmax;
00105     is_convex = g->isConvex();
00106     has_rho_scaling = g->hasRhoScaling();
00107     if( !has_rho_scaling ) {
00108         for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00109             if( geometries[j]->hasRhoScaling() ) {
00110                 has_rho_scaling = true; break;
00111             }
00112         }
00113     }
00114     if( !n_in ) return;
00115     if( newindexing ) {
00116         new_indexing = true;
00117         local_start = new int [n_in];
00118         reg_to_inscr = new int [nreg_inscribed];
00119         int ir=0;
00120         for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00121             int n = geometries[j]->regions();
00122             local_start[j] = nbase + ir;
00123             for(int i=0; i<n; i++) reg_to_inscr[ir++] = j;
00124         }
00125         nreg = nbase + ir;
00126     }
00127 }
00128 
00129 EGS_FastEnvelope::EGS_FastEnvelope(EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00130          const vector<EnvelopeAux *> &fgeoms, const string &Name,
00131          int newindexing) :
00132          EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), reg_to_inscr(0), local_start(0) {
00133     if( !G ) egsFatal("EGS_FastEnvelope: base geometry must not be null\n");
00134     g = G; g->ref();
00135     n_in = fgeoms.size(); nmax = 1; new_indexing = false;
00136     if( !n_in ) egsFatal("EGS_FastEnvelope: no inscribed geometries!\n");
00137     geometries = new EGS_BaseGeometry * [n_in];
00138     nbase = g->regions();
00139     int *iaux = new int [nbase]; int j;
00140     for(j=0; j<nbase; j++) iaux[j] = 0;
00141     int nlist = 0;
00142     int nreg_inscribed = 0;
00143     for(j=0; j<fgeoms.size(); j++) {
00144         geometries[j] = fgeoms[j]->g; geometries[j]->ref();
00145         int nj = geometries[j]->regions();
00146         nreg_inscribed += nj;
00147         if( nj > nmax ) nmax = nj;
00148         for(int i=0; i<fgeoms[j]->nreg; i++) {
00149             int k = fgeoms[j]->regs[i];
00150             if( k >= 0 && k < nbase ) { ++iaux[k]; ++nlist; }
00151         }
00152     }
00153     n_start = new int [nbase+1];
00154     glist = new int [nlist]; int ilist=0;
00155     for(j=0; j<nbase; j++) {
00156         n_start[j] = ilist;
00157         if( iaux[j] > 0 ) {
00158             for(int l=0; l<fgeoms.size(); l++) {
00159                 for(int i=0; i<fgeoms[l]->nreg; i++) {
00160                     int k = fgeoms[l]->regs[i];
00161                     if( k == j ) glist[ilist++] = l;
00162                 }
00163             }
00164         }
00165     }
00166     n_start[nbase] = ilist;
00167     nreg = nbase + n_in*nmax; is_convex = g->isConvex();
00168     has_rho_scaling = g->hasRhoScaling();
00169     if( !has_rho_scaling ) {
00170         for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00171             if( geometries[j]->hasRhoScaling() ) {
00172                 has_rho_scaling = true; break;
00173             }
00174         }
00175     }
00176     delete [] iaux;
00177     if( newindexing ) {
00178         new_indexing = true;
00179         local_start = new int [n_in];
00180         reg_to_inscr = new int [nreg_inscribed];
00181         int ir=0;
00182         for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00183             int n = geometries[j]->regions();
00184             local_start[j] = nbase + ir;
00185             for(int i=0; i<n; i++) reg_to_inscr[ir++] = j;
00186         }
00187         nreg = nbase + ir;
00188     }
00189 }
00190 
00191 EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::~EGS_EnvelopeGeometry() {
00192     if( !g->deref() ) delete g;
00193     for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00194         if( !geometries[j]->deref() ) delete geometries[j];
00195     }
00196     delete [] geometries;
00197     if( new_indexing ) {
00198         if( local_start ) delete [] local_start;
00199         if( reg_to_inscr ) delete [] reg_to_inscr;
00200     }
00201 }
00202 
00203 EGS_FastEnvelope::~EGS_FastEnvelope() {
00204     if( !g->deref() ) delete g;
00205     for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00206         if( !geometries[j]->deref() ) delete geometries[j];
00207     }
00208     delete [] geometries;
00209     delete [] n_start; delete [] glist;
00210     if( new_indexing ) {
00211         if( local_start ) delete [] local_start;
00212         if( reg_to_inscr ) delete [] reg_to_inscr;
00213     }
00214 }

00216 void EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::printInfo() const {
00217     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00218     egsInformation(" base geometry = %s (type %s)\n",g->getName().c_str(),
00219             g->getType().c_str());
00220     egsInformation(" inscribed geometries:\n");
00221     for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) egsInformation("   %s (type %s)\n",
00222             geometries[j]->getName().c_str(),geometries[j]->getType().c_str());
00223     egsInformation(
00224             "=======================================================\n");
00225 }

00227 void EGS_FastEnvelope::printInfo() const {
00228     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00229     egsInformation(" base geometry = %s (type %s)\n",g->getName().c_str(),
00230             g->getType().c_str());
00231     egsInformation(" inscribed geometries:\n");
00232     for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) egsInformation("   %s (type %s)\n",
00233             geometries[j]->getName().c_str(),geometries[j]->getType().c_str());
00234     egsInformation(
00235             "=======================================================\n");

00239 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message1[] =
00240     "createGeometry(envelope geometry): %s\n";
00241 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message2[] =
00242     "null input?";
00243 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message3[] =
00244     "no 'base geometry' input?";
00245 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message4[] =
00246     "incorrect base geometry definition";
00247 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message5[] =
00248     "missing/incorrect 'base geometry' input";
00249 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message6[] =
00250     "createGeometry(envelope geometry): no geometry with name %s defined\n";
00251 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message7[] =
00252     "no inscirebed geometries defined?. I hope you know what you are doing";
00253 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message8[] =
00254     "an error occured while constructing inscibed geometries";
00255 
00256 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_keyword1[] = "base geometry";
00257 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_keyword2[] = "geometry";
00258 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_keyword3[] = "inscribed geometries";
00259 
00260 extern "C" {
00261 
00262 EGS_ENVELOPEG_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00263     if( !input ) {
00264         egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message2);
00265         return 0;
00266     }
00267     //
00268     // *** new indexing style
00269     //
00270     int indexing = 0;
00271     input->getInput("new indexing style",indexing);
00272     //
00273     // *** Base geometry
00274     //
00275     EGS_Input *i = input->takeInputItem(eeg_keyword1);
00276     if( !i ) {
00277         egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message3); return 0;
00278     }
00279     EGS_Input *ig = i->takeInputItem(eeg_keyword2);
00280     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00281     if( ig ) { // defined inline
00282         g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(ig);
00283         delete ig;
00284         if( !g ) {
00285             egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message4);
00286             delete i; return 0;
00287         }
00288     }
00289     else {  // defined via a name of a previously defined geometry
00290         string bgname;
00291         int err = i->getInput(eeg_keyword1,bgname);
00292         delete i;
00293         if( err ) {
00294             egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message5); return 0;
00295         }
00296         g = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(bgname);
00297         if( !g ) {
00298             egsWarning(eeg_message6,bgname.c_str()); return 0;
00299         }
00300     }
00301     vector<EnvelopeAux *> fgeoms;
00302     EGS_Input *ix;
00303     while( (ix = input->takeInputItem("inscribe in regions")) != 0 ) {
00304         vector<string> values;
00305         ix->getInput("inscribe in regions",values);
00306         if( values.size() < 2 ) egsWarning("createGeometry(envelope geometry):"
00307               " %d inputs for 'inscribe in regions'? 2 or more are needed\n",values.size());
00308         else {
00309             EGS_BaseGeometry *gj = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(values[0]);
00310             if( !gj ) egsWarning(eeg_message6,values[0].c_str());
00311             else {
00312                 EnvelopeAux *aux = new EnvelopeAux;
00313                 aux->g = gj;
00314                 aux->nreg = values.size()-1;
00315                 aux->regs = new int [aux->nreg];
00316                 for(int j=0; j<aux->nreg; j++)
00317                     aux->regs[j] = atoi(values[j+1].c_str());
00318                 fgeoms.push_back(aux);
00319             }
00320         }
00321         delete ix;
00322     }
00323     if( fgeoms.size() > 0 ) {
00324         EGS_BaseGeometry *result = new EGS_FastEnvelope(g,fgeoms,"",indexing);
00325         result->setName(input);
00326         for(int j=0; j<fgeoms.size(); j++) delete fgeoms[j];
00327         return result;
00328     }
00329 
00330     //
00331     // *** Inscribed geometries
00332     //
00333     i = input->takeInputItem(eeg_keyword3);
00334     vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> geoms;
00335     if( !i ) {
00336         if( fgeoms.size() ) egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message7);
00337     }
00338     else {
00339         // first try for inscribed geometries defined inline
00340         while( (ig = i->takeInputItem(eeg_keyword2)) != 0 ) {
00341             EGS_BaseGeometry *gj = EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(ig);
00342             delete ig;
00343             if( !gj ) egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message8);
00344             else geoms.push_back(gj);
00345         }
00346         // if geoms.size() is 0, check if inscribed geometries are defined
00347         // via names of previously defined geometries.
00348         if( !geoms.size() ) {
00349             vector<string> igeoms;
00350             int err = i->getInput(eeg_keyword3,igeoms);
00351             if( err || !igeoms.size() )
00352                 egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message7);
00353             else {
00354                 for(unsigned int j=0; j<igeoms.size(); j++) {
00355                     EGS_BaseGeometry *gj =
00356                         EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(igeoms[j]);
00357                     if( !gj )
00358                         egsWarning(eeg_message6,igeoms[j].c_str());
00359                     else geoms.push_back(gj);
00360                 }
00361             }
00362         }
00363         delete i;
00364     }
00365     /*
00366     EGS_BaseGeometry *result = fgeoms.size() ?
00367         new EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(g,fgeoms,geoms) :
00368         new EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(g,geoms);
00369         */
00370     EGS_BaseGeometry *result = new EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(g,geoms,"",indexing);
00371     result->setName(input);
00372     result->setLabels(input);
00373     return result;
00374 
00375 }

00377 
00378 void EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00379 
00380     // label defined in the envelope geometry
00381     g->getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00382 
00383     // label defined in the inscribed geometries
00384     vector<int> gregs;
00385     int shift=0;
00386     for (int i=0; i<n_in; i++) {
00387 
00388         // add regions from set geometries
00389         gregs.clear();
00390         if (geometries[i]) geometries[i]->getLabelRegions(str, gregs);
00391 
00392         // shift region numbers according to indexing style
00393         if (new_indexing) shift = local_start[i];
00394         else shift = nbase+i*nmax;
00395         for (int j=0; j<gregs.size(); j++) {
00396             gregs[j] += shift;
00397         }
00398 
00399         // add regions to the list
00400         regs.insert(regs.end(), gregs.begin(), gregs.end());
00401 
00402     }
00403 
00404     // label defined in self (envelope geometry input block)
00405     EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00406 
00407 }
00408 
00409 void EGS_FastEnvelope::getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00410 
00411     // label defined in the envelope geometry
00412     g->getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00413 
00414     // label defined in the inscribed geometries
00415     vector<int> gregs;
00416     int shift=0;
00417     for (int i=0; i<n_in; i++) {
00418 
00419         // add regions from set geometries
00420         gregs.clear();
00421         if (geometries[i]) geometries[i]->getLabelRegions(str, gregs);
00422 
00423         // shift region numbers according to indexing style
00424         if (new_indexing) shift = local_start[i];
00425         else shift = nmax;
00426         for (int j=0; j<gregs.size(); j++) {
00427             gregs[j] += shift;
00428         }
00429 
00430         // add regions to the list
00431         regs.insert(regs.end(), gregs.begin(), gregs.end());
00432 
00433     }
00434 
00435     // label defined in self (envelope geometry input block)
00436     EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00437 
00438 }
